title: Hosana ti zelin aw Haleluia Amen
lyrics:
Hosana ti zelin aw. Haleluia Amen.
Lal Krista a lo piang e, Bethlehemah chuan;
A tawngkam chhuak hmangaih thu hnam tin damna a' ni,
Lawm takin i au vang, Hosana. tiin.

Aw, Bethlehem tlang chungah,
Chatuan khua a lo var e, hril vel chiam rawh u;
Tupawhin chu nunna eng lo lawma ring chuanin.
Lungchhiat tah leh buaina an tuar tawh lovang.

A makin a ropui e. ken remna Lalpa chu,
Hmangaihna a luantir e, khawvel ramah hian;
Sual ata kan tlan chhuah theihna tur a lo ni a,
Hmangaih ram Lal ani, kan Lal Isua.

Pa hun tiam athleng ta e, kan tan damna ani.
Hmangaihna a luang liam e, Kalvariah chuan;
A makzia tunge sawi thei. leilung awrawl zawng hian.
A hmangaihna ramah min hruai chhuak tawh ang.

Zion ropuina Lalpa, boral min zawngtu chu,
Van khawpuiten ui mahse. an dang zu lova;
Engkima engkim chungah Lalber rawh se, Amen
Min hmangaih hi tuman an hnial thei love
